member.name: M:OrchardCore.Alias.Handlers.AliasPartHandler.GetPatternAsync(OrchardCore.Alias.Models.AliasPart)
member.summary: Get the pattern from the AliasPartSettings property for its type.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Alias.Settings.AliasPartSettings.Options
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a user can define a custom alias.

member.name: M:AliasPartRazorHelperExtensions.GetContentItemIdByAliasAsync(OrchardCore.IOrchardHelper,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a content item id by its alias.
member.returns: A content item id or null if it was not found.

member.name: M:AliasPartRazorHelperExtensions.GetContentItemByAliasAsync(OrchardCore.IOrchardHelper,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads a content item by its alias.
member.param: Whether a draft should be loaded if available. false by default.
member.returns: A content item with the specific name, or null if it doesn't exist.
